title: Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro, AL Offers Convenient Lodging for ABA Bass Tournament on Lake Guntersville
text:
Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro, AL offers convenient lodging for the American Bass Anglers (ABA) fishing tournament on Lake Guntersville on August 15-16, 2015.
 SCOTTSBORO, AL, August 01, The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro AL hotel offers convenient lodging for the American Bass Anglers (ABA) tournament on Lake Guntersville. This Alabama North Division 29 tournament will run out of Goose Pond Colony Resort in Scottsboro on August 15-16. Entry fee is $140.
"We are a great lodging choice for fishermen participating in the ABA tournament on Lake Guntersville," comments Debra Luke, General Manager of the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro. "Our hotel near downtown Scottsboro is located just minutes from Goose Pond Colony," continues Ms. Luke.
The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro recently received its 3rd Lighthouse Award, the highest honor for the Hampton brand. The hotel's non-smoking guest rooms feature free high speed Internet and comfortable Clean and Fresh Hampton Beds . Guests will appreciate the convenience of the in-room microwave and mini refrigerator. King Studio suites are available. A complimentary Hampton on the House Breakfast, with hot waffle station, is available each morning. Hampton On the Run Breakfast Bags are a quick option on weekdays. The Pavilion Pantry Market in the lobby sells snacks and convenience items. Hampton's sparkling outdoor pool is the perfect place to cool off on hot summer days. Other property amenities include a business center, fitness center, and laundry facility. Nearby attractions include Unclaimed Baggage and beautiful Lake Guntersville. The hotel has ample boat trailer parking with charging stations.
Current hotel specials include the Shop and Drop Package, for guests visiting Unclaimed Baggage, and the Weekend Getaway Package with late checkout. HHonors members can earn Double Points or Double Miles through August 31, 2015. AAA and senior rates are available.
For information about upcoming ABA Alabama North Division 29 tournaments, visit www.americanbassanglers.com . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama hotel , call (256)259-5200 or visit online at www.ScottsboroAlabamaHotel.com .
About Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro Alabama Hotel
The Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro hotel in Alabama is located in the mountain/lakes region of northern Alabama surrounded by majestic mountains and rich valleys, located minutes from Lake Guntersville. Whether in town for business or pleasure, Hampton Inn & Suites Scottsboro has been designed with your comfort in mind, from boat parking to complimentary high-speed Internet access; your comfort is their main goal. Each of the hotel's spacious rooms and suites features the Clean & Fresh Hampton bed, mini refrigerator, microwave, work desk, basic cable plus HBO, and 37 inch flat panel TV.
For more information visit: http://www.ScottsboroAlabamaHotel.com
